title: Sign Online Waiver
des: Everyone participating in our activities at The Big Box must sign a waiver online. Waivers only need to be filled out once a year and are saved to your name and email address. Guardian must sign the waiver for 18 years & under.

title: Plan Your Adventure
des: Decide what activities your kids would love and choose from our exclusive combos which combine all the activities in The Big Box for a great price! We also offer a pay-for-what-you-play model so you can pick and choose options on your budget.

title: Combo & Play!
des: The Big Box offers 55,000 square feet of Entertainment Extravaganza including soft-play, inflatable, VR, Bumper Cars, Arcade, and Aerial Obstacle course. Once you are ready, you can purchase passes online on in-store. Let the Fun Begin!

title: Our Hours
des: We are open every day from 9AM to 9PM. See hetail Hours for all services and Statutory Holidays.

title: The Bite Box
des: Take a break and grab a drink & a bite at The Bite Box. Our Cafe has a delicious selection of Pizza, Hot Dogs, Chicken Tenders, Poutine, Fries, and much more.
